name: Crack Blocks ~ highly addicting block puzzle game
name_original: Crack Blocks ~ highly addicting block puzzle game
description:
Crack Blocks is a classic "don't fill up the board" block strategy puzzle game. It's incredibly simple to learn, and chances are you won't be able to put it down because it's DANGEROUSLY addictive. Trust us. Best of all it's completely FREE!!!

HOW TO PLAY

- Drag the blocks onto the board wherever they fit best
- Fill in 10 squares in a row vertically or horizontally to clear a column or row
- Don't let the board fill up, or it's game over
- If you make a mistake or get stuck, try using the clear or undo power ups

We worked hard to make this game as fun as possible, so please write us a good review and leave your feedback. All 5 star reviews are much appreciated. And don't forget to share with your friends and family! Most of all, HAVE FUN!!!
